      • post

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response post(es.unex.giiis.pi.rednotes.model.UserLogin newUser,
                                                                                 @Context
                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method, it's called when a new user register himself. The only obligatory properties that must be defined, must be: date, email, username and password. Other properties, can be put in this call.
        Parameters:
        newUser - User instance, with the information necessary to create a new user.
        request -
        Returns:
        response, with the URI of the new user, if we can create.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • put

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{idu: [0-9]+}")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response put(es.unex.giiis.pi.rednotes.model.UserLogin userUpdate,
                                                                                                              @PathParam(value="idu")
                                                                                                              long idu,
                                                                                                              @Context
                                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        This method, it's called when we want to update the information of our account The userUpdate, must content: date, idu, email and username. Else, this call doesn't work goodly. If you don't sent other property, like name, this property of user will have "" value.

        idu -
        request -
